answers.answer: OMG, that makes me sick!!!  Meli, no wonder you were so angry - how dare she put her baby in harm's way and for no good reason!!!  Not to mention herself as well.  Can you imagine being this girl's doctor and having to monitor her constantly for her diabetic condition w/her being so uncooperative??  What a mother, that's all I can say....

question: everything was good... I actually fell asleep and I am looking forward to them every friday for a little R and R haha!!!  BUT the young girl next to me was so dumb she made me mad...her baby had 4 heart decelerations where the heart rate went down and didn't go back up for over a minute... she was very big belly size so must have been far along.. and has type one diabetes that she is not controlling..  well they wanted her to go to labor and delivery for further monitoring and she refused...the nurse said you really should go... she said no,, so the nurse said be absolutely sure that your baby is moving 10X every 2 hours all the time.. I would hate you to have gotten this far and have something happen to your baby.  And the girl just left!!!  I am soooo mad... I couldn't believe that this girl didn't worry about the well being of her baby!!!  grrrrr... oh well, i just feel sorry for the little one
title: had a non stress test on friday (and mad story) :)
